title: Gomoku Game State JSON Schema
description: JSON schema for Gomoku game state, used for saving games and client-server communication with gomoku-httpd

X.description: Configuration and stats for the X player (always moves first)

O.description: Configuration and stats for the O player

board_size.description: Size of the game board (15x15 or 19x19)

radius.description: Search radius around existing stones for AI move generation

timeout.description: Timeout setting for moves (e.g., 'none' or time in milliseconds)

winner.description: Winner of the game, or 'none' if the game is still in progress

board_state.description: Visual representation of the board as an array of strings. Each string represents a row with cells separated by spaces. Cells contain '.', 'X', 'O', or Unicode equivalents

moves.description: Chronological list of moves made in the game

name.description: Name identifier for tactical test scenarios

description.description: Human-readable description of the game or test scenario

difficulty.description: Difficulty level for tactical test scenarios

expected_moves.description: List of acceptable correct moves for tactical tests

explanation.description: Explanation of the expected move for tactical tests

player.description: Type of player controlling this side

depth.description: Search depth for AI players (required if player is 'AI')

time_ms.description: Total time spent by this player in milliseconds

coordinate.description: Board coordinate as [row, column], 0-indexed from top-left

move.description: A single move in the game. Contains exactly one move key identifying the player and move coordinates

X (human).description: Move coordinates for human X player

X (AI).description: Move coordinates for AI X player

O (human).description: Move coordinates for human O player

O (AI).description: Move coordinates for AI O player

time_ms.description: Time taken for this move in milliseconds

moves_searched.description: Number of moves evaluated by AI for this move

score.description: AI's evaluation score for the chosen move

opponent.description: Best score available to opponent after this move

winner.description: True if this move wins the game
